${ModID}:SigilPotion.NAME: Sigil Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 1 of 3 random #ySigils to your hand and discard it.
Add !P! copies of 1 of 3 random #ySigils to your hand and discard them.

${ModID}:StoneskinPotion.NAME: Stoneskin Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce incoming attack damage by !P! this turn.

${ModID}:ForbiddenFlask.NAME: Forbidden Flask
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 1 of 3 random #yResonant cards to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.
Add !P! copies of 1 of 3 random #yResonant cards to your hand, they cost 0 this turn.

${ModID}:ElixirOfFalseHealth.NAME: Elixir of False Health
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #yTemporary #yHP equal to !P!% of your max HP.

${ModID}:UnicornBlood.NAME: Unicorn Blood
DESCRIPTIONS: Obtain a unique #yCurse and Gain !P! Max HP.
Obtain two unique #yCurses and Gain !P! Max HP.

${ModID}:SteelhidePotion.NAME: Steelhide Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would take damage this combat, take !P! less.

${ModID}:PoisonousSmokeBomb.NAME: Poisonous Smoke Bomb
DESCRIPTIONS: Flee from a normal combat.  Still gain rewards.
Flee from a non-boss combat.  Still gain rewards.

${ModID}:ToxicOil.NAME: Toxic Oil
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your attacks deal unblocked damage, apply !P! #yDecay to the target.

${ModID}:SlipperyPotion.NAME: Slippery Potion
${ModID}:SlipperyPotion.FLAVOR: Some mysterious green cloaked stranger has been selling these for a lot of money.
